API_Description: Determines if the document is part of an online review process.
API_Description_Reason: The method name 'isOnlineReview' suggests it checks whether a document is involved in an online review, which is a common feature in collaboration tools.
Returns: A boolean indicating whether the document is part of an online review.
Returns_Reason: The method likely returns a boolean value because it is a check (indicated by 'is') to determine the status of the document in relation to online reviews.

doc.description: The document object to be checked for online review status.
doc.description_reason: The parameter 'doc' is likely the document being checked, as it is common to pass the document of interest to such methods.
doc.type_reason: The 'doc' parameter is a built-in object, which suggests it is a document object that the method will evaluate.
